content: do not use knitting on the net version it is incorrect use **march 2024** version note the pattern in the calendar & still listed at knitting on the net are both incorrect this ravelry download has the only corrected version as of march 4 2024 please download the updated file before starting the pattern **after first row of boxes and 6 row of garter stitch are completed you will be on the wrong side of your work that means that all knit stitches will become purl stitches and all purl stitches will be knit stitches after second row of boxes you will go back to the original pattern after the second row of boxes is complete you will be on the right side of the woark again therefore all odd row of boxes will be in original pattern and all even row of boxes will be done as in the second paragraph above **
